TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi VirtualizingStackPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizingPanel implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo
Public Class VirtualizingStackPanel Inherits VirtualizingPanel Implements IScrollInfo
type VirtualizingStackPanel = class inherit VirtualizingPanel interface IScrollInfo

summary.span: 排列和虛擬化單一水平或垂直行的內容。

span.span: Arranges and virtualizes content on a single line that is oriented either horizontally or vertically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準版面配置系統會建立項目容器，並計算每個項目清單控制項相關聯的版面配置。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. Word"虛擬化 」 是指一種技術供子集[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]從大量資料項目，根據畫面上所顯示的項目產生項目。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 產生了許多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]時只有少數的項目可能會在螢幕上的項目可能會影響您的應用程式的效能。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 會計算可見的項目數目，並搭配從(這類或是) 來建立[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]可見的項目元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items. 中的虛擬化只發生於項目所包含的控制項台中會建立自己的項目容器。Virtualization in a only occurs when the items control contained in the panel creates its own item containers. 您可以確保發生資料繫結，透過這種情況。You can ensure this happens by using data binding. 在其中建立和加入項目控制項，項目容器的情況下任何效能優勢上優於。In scenarios where item containers are created and added to the items control, a offers no performance advantage over a . 是預設項目主控件項目。 is the default items host for the element. 根據預設，`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的屬性設定為`true`。By default, the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is set to `true`. 當`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的屬性設定為`false`，則行為與一般相同。When the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is set to `false`, a behaves the same as an ordinary . ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將繫結至 XML 資料來源，以及虛擬化中顯示的項目項目使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。The following example shows how to bind to an XML data source and virtualize the items displayed in a element using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 請注意，`VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing`附加的屬性明確設為`true`。Notice that the `VirtualizingStackPanel.IsVirtualizing` attached property is explicitly set to `true`. [!code-xaml[VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/VirtualizingStackPanel_Intro/CS/default.xaml#2)] 下列範例會建立，並設定`VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode`; 附加屬性。The following example creates a and sets the `VirtualizingStackPanel.VirtualizationMode` attached property to . [!code-xaml[RecycleItemContainerShippets#VirtualizationMode](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#virtualizationmode)] 下列範例會顯示在上述範例中使用的資料。The following example shows the data used in the previous example. [!code-csharp[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#listboxdata)] [!code-vb[RecycleItemContainerShippets#ListBoxData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RecycleItemContainerShippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#listboxdata)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準版面配置系統會建立項目容器，並計算每個項目清單控制項相關聯的版面配置。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. Word"虛擬化 」 是指一種技術供子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]從大量資料項目，根據畫面上所顯示的項目產生項目。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 產生了許多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]時只有少數的項目可能會在螢幕上的項目可能會影響您的應用程式的效能。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 會計算可見的項目數目，並搭配從(這類或是) 來建立[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]可見的項目元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items.

summary.span: 將內容向下捲動一個邏輯單位。

span.span: Scrolls content downward by one logical unit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫這個方法來變更如何堆疊面板向下捲動內容的衍生類別中。You can override this method in a derived class to change how the stack panel scrolls content downward. 比方說，您可以向下捲動內容，而不是一個兩個單位。For example, you can scroll content down by two units instead of one. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動的比較，包裝中並設定其屬性設`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在此情況下，提供捲動和虛擬化已停用。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向下捲動，當不會配置大小，但實際上在 z 平面，這通常會裁剪的父項目將其子系 (通常) 至堆疊的大小。When scrolling, does not grow in layout size, but effectively adds its descendants on a z-plane, which is normally clipped by a parent element (typically a ) to the size of the stack.

summary.span: 將內容依邏輯向下捲動，以回應滑鼠滾輪按鈕的向下動作。

span.span: Scrolls content logically downward in response to a downward click of the mouse wheel button.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫變更堆疊面板如何回應滑鼠滾輪向下動作的衍生類別中。You can override in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the mouse wheel down action. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動的比較，包裝中並設定其屬性設`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在此情況下，提供捲動和虛擬化已停用。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準版面配置系統會建立項目容器，並計算每個項目清單控制項相關聯的版面配置。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. Word"虛擬化 」 是指一種技術供子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]從大量資料項目，根據畫面上所顯示的項目產生項目。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 產生了許多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]時只有少數的項目可能會在螢幕上的項目可能會影響您的應用程式的效能。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 會計算可見的項目數目，並搭配從(這類或是) 來建立[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]可見的項目元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items.

abstract member PageDown : unit -> unit override this.PageDown : unit -> unit

summary.span: 將內容向下捲動一頁。

span.span: Scrolls content downward by one page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫變更堆疊面板如何回應 page down 動作的衍生類別中。You can override in a derived class to change how the stack panel responds to the page down action. 如果您需要實體捲動，而不邏輯捲動的比較，包裝中並設定其屬性設`false`。If you require physical scrolling instead of logical scrolling, wrap the in a and set its property to `false`. 在此情況下，提供捲動和虛擬化已停用。In this case, the provides scrolling, and virtualization is disabled.

param.name: element
param.span: 要從中移除處理常式的 。

span.span: Specifies the event handler that is to be removed.

summary.span: 移除 附加事件的事件處理常式。

span.span: Removes an event handler for the attached event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標準版面配置系統會建立項目容器，並計算每個項目清單控制項相關聯的版面配置。The standard layout system creates item containers and computes layout for each item associated with a list control. Word"虛擬化 」 是指一種技術供子集[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]從大量資料項目，根據畫面上所顯示的項目產生項目。The word "virtualize" refers to a technique by which a subset of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements are generated from a larger number of data items based on which items are visible on-screen. 產生了許多[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]時只有少數的項目可能會在螢幕上的項目可能會影響您的應用程式的效能。Generating many [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements when only a few elements might be on the screen can adversely affect the performance of your application. 會計算可見的項目數目，並搭配從(這類或是) 來建立[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]可見的項目元素。The calculates the number of visible items and works with the from an (such as or ) to create [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] elements only for visible items.
